title: Unusually high ping (NA)
body: I live i n massachusetts and normally experience about 44-46 ping, but in my most recent game it felt like pre server move, I was getting around 72-150 ping, and I was checking ping more than minimap. I really played poorly because of it, it is not my router and it probably is a riot issue. Is there anything you guys can do to help with this.

replies.body:
I live in Missouri and I'm having the same problem.
I was getting 21-23 ping now i get 36-42 and I get horrible packet loss.(can see hp bars etc moving but champs and minions dont move)
I ran a tracert and the problem for me at least seems to be with these:
chi-b21-link.telia.net [62.115.8.197]
chi-b21-link.telia.net [62.115.133.205]
{{champion:32}}

I wonder if that ping spike was caused by a hiccup in the way your ISP was sending your signal to our servers, or if this was a permanent increase overall? Try updating some of your [**network settings**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) and let me know if that gets you back down to your old ping.

I live in mass also <3
I have the same problem with league of legends only
